description: This source file provides wrapper functions around the syscfg API, including initialization, commit, get, and set operations for system configuration.

methods.name: int SyscfgInit()
methods.description: Initializes the system configuration by calling syscfg_init.

methods.name: int SyscfgCommit()
methods.description: Commits the current system configuration changes by calling syscfg_commit.

methods.name: int SyscfgGet(const char * name,char * value,int size)
methods.description: Retrieves a configuration value by calling syscfg_get with given name, output buffer, and size.

methods.name: int SyscfgSet(const char * name,const char * value)
methods.description: Sets a configuration value by calling syscfg_set and then commits the changes if successful.

ctags.name: SyscfgGet
ctags.pattern: /^int SyscfgGet(const char * name, char * value, int size)$/

ctags.name: SyscfgSet
ctags.pattern: /^int SyscfgSet(const char * name, const char * value)$/
